Director/Producer Roy Szuper, brother-in-law and music fanatic Concert Joe, and punk rocker Tony Petrozza, set out to create the 1st Annual Williamsburg Music Festival as a statement of protest against the incoming Republican National Convention. Joe acts as our guide through the New York music scene while Szuper borrows money, seeks advice, and secures talent for the festival. Along the way we meet legendary activist/musician, David Peel, who entertains us with his history of political irreverence. We also interview another New York legend in Hilly Kristal, founder of CGGB's, who touches on topics such as the corporatization of music and the impending closing of CB's. After tremendous financial maneuvering and miles of red tape created by the city bureaucracy in their pre-RNC paranoia, the festival takes place as scheduled, 9 days before the RNC. Despite all the hard work and expectations, torrential rains put a damper on the festival. Despite the rains, 8 bands performed including David Peel, Tony Petrozza and his band SQNS, Dana Fuchs, the city's most intense subway performer Shakerleg, and headliner Vernon Reid and friends. Despite the financial disaster for producer Roy Szuper, the spirit of the festival carries us through to the RNC. Once there, we experience the largest protest in the history of any political convention in history and the premiere activist concert of RNC week featuring Tom Morello and Michael Franti and Spearhead. The film also features appearances Agnostic Front lead guitarist and Hardcore Tattoo Founder Vinnie Stigma, Dana Beal, leader of the Yippies, legendary TV/radio host Joe Franklin, Jake Hill, Publisher of Spin Magazine, the festival's main sponsor, and Punk Magazine founder John Holmstrom. .

title: La película de Niní
description: A portrait about the life and the time of Niní Marshall, the greatest Argentine humorous actress. The movie includes fragments of 37 films and two TV-specials, interviews, documents and testimonies.

title: 24 Wirklichkeiten in der Sekunde
description: A portrait of a dedicated filmmaker who is a charming yet elusive figure in thrall to cinema and the constant perfection of his craft.

title: Häusliche Gewalt - Wenn die Familie zur Hölle wird
From Two Men and a War
description: Filmmaker Robert Drew recounts his experience as a WWII fighter pilot, and his encounters with the Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter, Ernie Pyle.

title: Une rencontre avec les élèves de première du Lycée Guist'hau de Nantes (Année 2004-2005) (Carnet Filmé: 9 mars 2005)
atores: Les Élèves de 1ère du Lycée Guist'hau de Nantes

title: Fuori fuoco - Cinema, ribelli e rivoluzionari
The Truth About Chip and Pin
description: The London Programme investigates the bank's response to the rapidly growing card fraud epidemic that's costing London and the South East over 40 million pounds a year. Banks hope that the introduction of Chip and Pin technology will stop the fraudsters in their tracks. But will the new system cause more problems than it solves?

title: Gia pente diamerismata kai ena magazi!
description:
"Gia pente diamerismata kai ena magazi" is a documentary about how the process of "exchange" transformed the neighborhoods of major cities of Greece, particularly Athens and Pireus. "Exchange" is the process of a landowner making his land available to a building contractor so that an appartment building (with one or more shops on the ground floor) can be built. At the completion of the construction the landowner will receive a number of appartments and a shop for his own use while the contractor gets the rest of the appartments and shops, hence the title "In Exchange for Five Apartments and One Shop".

This process, still very popular today, transformed the scenery of Athens in a radical manner converting neighborhoods of rooftop houses into ones of several-stories high buildings.

The filmaker went through the filming locations of the exterior scenes of more than 400 greek movies filmed in the 1950's through 1970's and presents some of these scenes in contrast to the way these locations look today.

title: Historia chiquita que cruza un océano
description: The film is the story of a young couple who leaves their country, Uruguay, when the military dictatorship was at the offing. It was a graduation trip around the world during which they decide to stay in Barcelona. And they will never return again. As a narrator, a girl who discovers the story of her parents through the travel letters and forms her identity as a daughter of immigrants. The process of uprooting and "rerooting".

title: The Making of 'Sideways'
description: This making-of piece includes the usual array of movie clips, behind the scenes shots, and remarks. We hear from Payne, Giamatti, Church, and actors Sandra Oh and Virginia Madsen. They mostly regurgitate story and character notes along with a few minor insights into the interaction among the cast and director.

title: The Flintstones Bedrock Collectables - Collecting All Things Flintstones
Dancing on Ice
description: Documentary on world-famous figure-skating champions John and Sinead Kerr.

title: Poets in Hip Hop
description: Live from the Ivar Theater in Hollywood. Touchstar Media Presents the Poets in Hip Hop. Featuring some of todays hottest spoken word artists, including Bidget Gray (2001 Grand Slam Champion), Gaknew, Miss Kimm, Joy Jones, Gina Loring, Jahaira and many more. These gifted and talented poets speak on topics from racism to politics in a way that all can relate. This is one of the most significant spoken word performances of our time. One thats guaranteed to inspire and lift you to a higher level of consciousness. Each performance is incredibly emancipating and liberating. Representing a movement thats guaranteed to make history. So sit back, relax... and be entertained.

title: Adventures in High Mountain: Mont-Blanc, Europe
description: An expedition to the Mont-Blanc, one of the highest peaks of the World, offers a real awareness of the increasing fragility of the best preserved places far from our daily life.

title: Mit dem Mut der Verzweiflung - Jüdischer Widerstand gegen Hitler
Mitges de seda: Núria Feliu, 40 anys
Königsberg - Ferne, fremde Heimat: Ostpreußen und das Erbe Stalins
Luciano Pavarotti: A Legend Turns 70
description: Brief (18 min) documentary skimming Pavarotti's life and career, combined with recital footage (41 min).

title: F.A.Q. - Film o Koroski/Ein Film über Kärnten
description: F.A.Q. is a film about the fate of the Slovene language in Austria's state of Carinthia, and therefore about the fate of the country's Slovene minority. Its extraordinary aspect is the easy-going, confident and humorous way in which the topic is examined.

title: Entre gallos y la media noche
description: Investigates the operations of the EnCana Corporation, a firm that, despite proud public declarations of its social responsibility, is shown to be answerable for widespread environmental contamination and human rights violations

title: I ekdromi - Ioannina
description: The Excursion began as a documentary with an intense search of space in relation to time and the land and how this is expressed in the daily life, and how it influences the people and their habits.

title: Great Cities of Europe
description: Explore some of the very best sites, sounds and tastes Europe has to offer. This series takes you from one European hot spot to the next, introducing you to famous landmarks as well as great places to sleep, eat and soak up the culture.

title: 'National Treasure' on Location
description: This making-of featurette takes you to the many locations important to the film to find out how they shot in such hallowed historical venues and how they created exact replicas of such places. These insights, plus revealing information about working with the actors and director, the stunts and the special effects, are disclosed in this entertaining peek behind the scenes.

title: Three Voices Remember: For a Few Dollars More
X Rated: The Ads They Couldn't Show
In the Shadow of the Palms - Iraq
description: The Internationally Multi-Award Winning Feaure In the Shadow of the Palms is the Only documentary filmed in Iraq prior to, during, and after the fall of Saddam Hussein. It documents the changes in Iraqi society, and the lives of ordinary Iraqis by focusing on a cross-section of individuals. The film presents audiences with a window into the everyday realities for those living through this controversial war. The film documents how life is for the society and people living under twelve years of sanctions and the regime of Saddam Hussein. When the inevitability of the US-led conflict increased and people across the globe protested the war, the filmmakers recorded the changes in the lives of the Iraqi people, focusing on a cross-section of individuals representative of the broader Iraqi community. The film follows these individuals as they prepare for the coalition war against their country and as it becomes the target for tens of thousands of coalition cruise missiles and guided bombs. The film shows first hand the effects of the bombing campaign on the lives of civilians.

title: 62 Years and 6500 Miles Between
description: Asking her grandmother what advice she has for young people, filmmaker Anita Chang receives a simple reply: "Politics!" Despite a third stroke and a century of struggle, "Democratic Grandma" remains true to the ideals that earned her acclaim and a memorable nickname in Taiwan. However, she also knows that progress exacts a price-a realization rendered vividly and with poignant candor in Chang's portrait of her headstrong amah. Tracing the parallel threads of her female relatives' stories, Chang (SHE WANTS TO TALK TO YOU, SFIAAFF '02) uncovers revelations of political persecution while focusing on the struggle to maintain-and sometimes resist-the bonds of filial traditions. A mesmerizing and provocative meditation on history-making and the post-colonial condition, this dynamic documentary intimately depicts what it means to be a part of a family, a nation, and a world in constant upheaval.

title: I poeti, le città
description: The four County Seats of Abruzzo, Italy (L'Aquila, Pescara, Teramo, Chieti), plus San Vito Chietino, a place dear to Gabriele D'Annunzio - the great 20th-century writer, he himself born in Abruzzo - are illustrated by five Abruzzese contemporary poets.

title: Armenia: A Country Under Blockade
description: Documentary about the devastating Illegal Turkish blockade of Armenia.

title: L'intuition intuitionnee
description: -Film with the painters who signed the Manifesto of the Plastic Artists of 1955 Louis Belzile, Fernand Toupin and Jean-Paul Jérôme, as well as the participation of Bertin Savard in the role of Rodolphe de Repentigny, the 4th founding member of the group who died in 1959.

title: Fit Family
description: One unfit family gets fit over the course of six weeks with the help of trainers Nikki Kimbrough and Brett Hoebel.

title: Plymouth Montserrat: The Latter Day Pompeii
description: On July 18th of 1995, Montserrat's sleeping volcano rumbled back to life after hundreds of years of dormancy. This is the ten year story of that eruption and it's effects on the people of, 'The Emerald Isle of the Caribbean'

title: Buba
description: A film portraying the life and career of a renown film and theater comedian Boris Sichkin (Buba, being his stage name). The narration takes us through his early years, rise and fall of popularity, persecution, immigration, relative success in the US and his final days in the year 2002.

title: The Baha'i Gardens of Haifa
description: The movie shows the impressive beauty and captures the spiritual atmosphere of the Baha'i Gardens in Israel.

title: Regisseur Günter Reisch erinnert sich ... und öffnet sein 8mm Filmarchiv
Amazonia Vertical
description: Auyan Tepui... The highest table mountain in the Amazon... Indians believe that demons live on the top of it...Becko Ondrejovic managed the first complete traverse.

title: Résistance - 3. Der Fall Wallenberg: Retter und Opfer
Champions on Wheels
description: Is there life after disability? Wheelchair tennis players squeeze joy from every moment as they go for gold in Athens. Champions on Wheels reveals their courage, determination, powerful athleticism, zest for life, and burning desire to be seen as normal.

title: Volver la vista - der umgekehrte Blick
description: VOLVER LA VISTA moves the viewer into the perspective of a foreigner. Mexicans who live in Austria and Austrians who spend their lives in Mexico: through clichés and yearnings - these emigrants create a picture of their countries, and through determining their location, attempt to their identity. They are accompanied by two cinematographers, who also go to a "foreign" place. Their views go along with the narrators and narratives into the respective, other country.

title: Amerikas Spagat zwischen Irak und Nordkorea - Das Imperium an den Grenzen seiner Macht
A Measure of Our Humanity: HIV/AIDS in Namibia
description: Taking to heart Nelson Mandela's recent declaration that "AIDS is no longer a disease, it is a human rights issue," this documentary provides a unique and intimate perspective on the complex causes and effects of the AIDS epidemic in Namibia.

title: Les bidasses en folie: La douce folie des bidasses
Ernie's Game
description: Obsessive backgammon player Ernie is successful in life with millions in the bank but lives a hair raisin gambling life playing exceptional players for big money.

title: Press Pass to the World
description: "Press Pass to the World" follows an ensemble cast of respected journalists through the difficult, adventurous lifestyle of foreign reporting for some of the world's leading newspapers.

title: Exclusive Interviews
description: Interviews on Goodbye Again (1968) and its stars, Peter Cook and Dudley Moore.

title: Touching Home: Baseball in the Bushes
description: A close-up look into the world of low-level professional baseball

title: Bill Clinton: Speeches of the Presidential Years, 1993-2001
Dauerstau auf Schlaglochpisten - Das deutsche Straßenchaos
Riddim Driven: VP Records 25th Anniversary Concert
description: VP Records 25th Anniversary DVD: includes a fantastic concert with Elephant Man, Sizzla, Beres Hammond and more. A documentary about the legendary reggae label with Shaggy, Beenie Man, Marcia Griffiths and legendary reggae/dancehall stars.

title: Diminishing Memories
description: Has anyone contemplated what Singapore's prosperity has been built on? This film takes you on a personal journey with me, the filmmaker, to recollect my childhood memories of living in the countryside of Singapore - Lim Chu Kang, a village that has already died and its spirit dispersed. This documentary also suggests the price Singaporeans have to pay as a result of industrialisation and economic development.

title: Perimenontas tous Olympiakous
description: Greek director Amalia Zepos explores the four-year preparations for the 2004 summer Olympics in Athens.

title: 50 Terrible Predictions
description: A look a the 50 worst predictions ever made from individuals ranging from Arthur C. Clarke through to Lord David Steel.

title: Restoration Italian Style: For a Few Dollars More
The Cursed Effects
description: A look at how the special effects were made for 'Cursed'.

title: The Wolani
description: A West Papuan highland chief is killed by his teenage bride's lover sparking a tense standoff between two clans of the Wolani tribe. A war is averted when the bride's clan offers two ancient kowrie shells, Bubu and Ebonepo, in payment for the chief's life.

title: Del sud a Catalunya: Testimonis d'una immigració
I'm Just 18
description: Through the authentic footage filmed by Marua, and edited with a professional documentary filmmaker, we meet Marua at a key juncture in her life: while suitors ask her father for her hand according to Arab traditions, she dreams of education and self fulfillment. Marua makes her decision in her own unique manner. (14 minutes)

title: Alan Shearer's Pro Training Skill Factor
description: Join Alan Shearer and a team of professional players as they show you all the moves and technical skills to help you improve your game. Packed full of helpful tips and advice, THE PRO-TRAINING SKILL FACTOR puts you through your paces with a series of training modules covering; WARM UP - WINNING THE BALL BACK - DEFENDING AS GROUP / TEAM - ATTACKING PLAY, POSSESSION AND MOVEMENT - MOTIVATION - CHANGE OF MODE - ATTACKING AND SCORING.

title: Mike Hodges: Uncompromising Poet of the Prescient
description: Cult filmmaker Mike (Get Carter) Hodges discusses his 40-year career in movies during an engaging and illuminating Q&A session at the 11th Bradford Film Festival in 2005.

title: Yannis et les autres - Voyage musical de Olympos à la Calabre
description: Archeology of the future: stones as music are helping us to create a new possible tomorrow.

title: Living Rights: Roy, Yoshi, Toti, Lena
Elvis Presley. In the Power of Rock
A propósito de Cristian
atores: Ma. de los Dolores Javier López

title: MO Girls: The Making of... Occupation - Hollywood
description: The MO Girls are back for their 4th year and 2nd DVD saga, now see them put together their new Hollywood schemed lingerie/swimsuit style glamour masterpiece. This DVD includes uncensored model screenings held in Los Angeles, CA and Atlanta, GA and the sexy photo shoots of the selected 2005 MO Girl calendar models. This DVD is hosted by MO Girl Alumus Dayana Jamine from the MO Girls Sports Zone calendar and DVD, as well as the star of the Occupation: HOLLYWOOD movie.

title: North station blues
description: Singer-songwriter Owe Thörnqvist is a true legend; at the same time enormously popular but also an outsider, a comic talent (he was the one who brought stand-up comedy to Sweden) and a philosopher.

title: Secrets of Summerfield: The Making of 'Summerfield'
Britain's Streets of Vice: Behind Closed Doors
description: A frank look at Britain's brothels. Observational and investigative documentary about Britain off-street sex industry.

title: Bubba Ho-Tep: UK Premiere Screening and Q & A with Don Coscarelli
Immigration: 30 ans d'illusions
description: This report, mapping the history of immigration in France since 1974, uses documentary archive footage and interviews with experts from the political world, sociologists and migrants who have succeeded in their integration process.

title: Directing Who: Michael Ferguson
description: For the special features of the official DVD release of the story, Michael Ferguson talks about directing The Claws of Axos: Episode One (1971).

title: Rever
description: RETURN documents the search for people and places photographed 22 years ago in the outskirts of Rio de Janeiro. While looking at their photos, the people found tell us about their lives.

title: Der Kreml - Im Herzen Russlands
description: A Western camera crew's first look at the Russian power center in action.

title: Between the Bridges
description: Between the Bridges: Change On the Waterfront D.U.M.B.O. (Down Under the Manhattan Bridge Overpass) Brooklyn, New York. The newest hip NY artists' community struggles against development and gentrification on the Brooklyn waterfront: a microcosm of our post 9/11 world.

title: Atrapados por el dopaje
description: Very few athletes admit to having taken doping substances, but positives in anti-doping controls are constant. Erythropoietin, Nandrolone, Cortisone..., all of them substances of exclusively medical employ, with an almost magical power when used by elite athletes. The athlete that takes them can beat his own record or improve his performance and reach the podium. Dopes can make athletes win medals, a match, a stage... The athlete ends by being the victim of a system that more and more induces to doping. Technicians, clubs and directors benefit from the victories that doping produces, but when the athlete is 'marked' in a control, he is the only one that faces the consequences, not only sportive but also in his health. Athletes who have given 'positives' in controls do not admit taking dope, nor do they blame anybody in their entourage but they all attribute the 'positive' to a scientific error; such is the case of Alberto García, or the footballer Carlos Gurpegui. Only a cyclist, Jesús Manzano, has dared to denounce the doping networks and that has caused him big judiciary problems in our country.

title: In My Father's Den: Behind the Scenes Footage and Clips
Global Focus II: The New Environmentalists
description: 'Global Focus II- The New Environmentalists' is the second annual installment of a half hour program that features intimate portraits of seven passionate and dedicated activists. These are true environmental heroes who have put themselves between corrupt governments, greedy corporations and other intimidating adversaries. Their goal: safeguarding the Earth's natural resources from shortsighted exploitation and unbridled pollution. Robert Redford narrates.

title: Submarine: Hidden Hunter
description: The U.S.S. Virginia is the first of thirty planned attack submarines designed after the Cold War. This program reviews the designs of the United States' previous attack submarines and the new post-Cold War threats and missions that make the new design necessary. Then we follow the Virginia on its sea trials leading up to its commissioning ceremony into the U.S. Navy fleet.

title: Making of 'Rhythm City Volume One: Caught Up'
Ruins of the Reich: The Final Chapter
description: The Final Chapter traces the events that would eventually lead to the fall of Hitler's Third Reich and the destruction of a once great nation. The episode begins with the allied invasion of Europe and ends with a tour of the only remaining intact section of the Berlin Chancellery bunker. Highlights include an in-depth tour of the historic D-Day landing sites at Utah, Omaha, Gold, Juno and Sword beaches including the solemn monuments and memorials. The tour continues with stops at Rommel's headquarters at La Roche Guyon, Hitler's headquarters, Wolfsschluct II and Wolfsschanze. Other stops include Gestapo headquarters, the people's court and execution chamber at Plotzensee Prison. Viewers will also visit sites made famous during the Battle of the Bulge, including the remains of the Remagen bridge. In addition to the remaining Nazi buildings of the Third Reich viewers will be taken on a fascinating tour of one of Hitler's Teutonic castles of order, Ordenburg Vogelsang.

title: Oi Ellines irthan apo ton okeano
Hogtown: The Politics of Policing
description: Hogtown: The Politics of Policing is an unblinking look at political pressures and their impact on the operations of the Toronto Police Services Board.

title: Hollywood and Divine: Beauty Secrets Revealed
Molinari: la couleur chante,
description: -A profile of Guidi Molinari, famous abstract painter, realized 16 months before his death.

title: Exorcist: The Beginning - Behind the Scenes
Hyde Behind the Scenes
description: A documentary on the behind the scenes of Nathan Hill's short film, "The Strange Game of Hyde & Seek."

title: La persona de Leo N.
description: As a twelve-year-old boy, Nicola de Leo already knew she wanted to become a woman. Today, the now forty-year-old transsexual lives in Venice and has changed her name to Nicole. She has undergone a hormone treatment and grown breasts, but she still lives inside the body of a middle-aged man, including a penis, a beard and a substantial Adam's apple. This is why Nicole is applying for a sex change through official channels. 'I never thought it would be so hard. I thought making the decision was enough,' she says. During five tense years, Nicole fights her emotional and physical struggle in the presence of director Alberto Vendemmiati's camera. Working as an actress, a seller of carnival masks and a prostitute, she finances her cosmetic treatments and looks forward to the subsidised sex change operation. Meanwhile, she turns to her elderly mother for support, who has a hard time accepting that her son will soon be a daughter.

title: And Thereafter
description: A documentary following the life of a Korean woman who came to the USA when she married a GI after the Korean War.

title: Now & Then: The Locations of the Claws of Axos
description: A look at the location work of the Doctor Who serial "The Claws of Axos", narrated by Katy Manning. Originally included as an extra on The Claws of Axos DVD release, it was also featured on the Season 8 BluRay Collection.

title: Kakolyri 5/44... I istoria mias meras
description: During the Axis occupation in Greece, one night in Evia, the insurgents trying to blow up the bridge of Skoteini kill the Nazi guard of the bridge. The next day the Nazis enter the village of Kakoliri, burned down all houses and executed all the 30 men of the village. This documentary records the fact and the aftermath through testimonials of survivors and relatives.

title: Livin' Large
description: Livin' Large takes a look at how the American Dream is morphing from 'life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness' into one of 'consumerism and mass consumption'. This documentary explores how we have been trained by the advertising industry to consume at rates which will soon threaten our very existence. We must find balance or pay the price

title: Entering Zion
description: Entering Zion will take you on a pilgrimage through the land of Israel. You'll go from the clubs of Tel Aviv to the shores of the Dead Sea, from the beaches of Eilat to the border overlooking the security fence, and from the holy sites of Jerusalem to the Church of Nativity in Bethlehem.

title: Synitheies
description: Depicts daily life at the State School of Dance, in Athens, Greece.

title: Ales Angels: Blood, Sweat and Beers
description: With training consisting only of heavy drinking and smoking, five ageing men take five ageing cycle-craft and ride from Edinburgh to York in a heart-warming tale of camaraderie through the best and worst of the British countryside.

title: Israels Jails
description: Inside Israel's highest security prisons Palestinian fighters and bombers come face to face with the coercive power of the Israeli State. In the confined space of the jails Israelis & Palestinians have to co-exist.

title: Josh's Trees
description: Portrait of director Peter Entell's friend and fellow-filmmaker Josh Hanig, who died of cancer, incorporating many home video extracts

title: I Was a Teenage Feminist
description: When did feminism become a bad word? Why is it that young independent, progressive women in today's society feel uncomfortable identifying with the F-word? Join filmmaker Therese Shechter as she takes a funny, moving and very personal journey into the heart of Feminism, circa 2005. Armed with a video camera and an irreverent sense of humor, Therese talks with Feminist superstars, rowdy frat boys, liberated Cosmo girls and Radical Cheerleaders, all in her quest to find out whether Feminism can still be a source of personal and political power.

title: System Failure: Violence, Abuse and Neglect in the California Youth Authority
description: This video exposes the horrific conditions and human rights violations endemic of the California Youth Authority, one of the largest youth correctional agencies in the United States. "System Failure" calls for the CYA's nine prison facilities to be replaced with regional rehabilitation centers and local community based alternatives.

title: Breakin' In: The Making of a Hip Hop Dancer
Expert Fisherman: Feeder Fishing
description: In this film Bob visits the excellent Haveringland Hall Park Lake near Norwich; a superb water for feeder fishing at range, with a good stock of bream amongst other species. It is glorious and Bob is in fine form. His easy going manner and careful way of explaining the tips and tricks that have made him the greatest angler in the world today can help you catch more fish by this tried and tested system. By placing a small bed of bait tight to your hook baits it isn't too long until fish come in thick and fast. This programme can truly you help you become more successful at feeder fishing.

title: Heysel '85 - Requiem for a Cup Final
description: On May 29, 1985, in the final of the annual tournament to decide Europe's best football team, reigning champions, Liverpool, met Juventus of Turin at Heysel Stadium in Brussels. Thousands traveled to watch their heroes play. Kick-off was postponed after Liverpool fans broke a fence, then invaded and attacked a section of Juve supporters in Block Z of the stadium. The resulting panic killed 39 people, almost all Italian. Nevertheless, the match proceeded, while dead and injured were hauled to hospitals. At half time, over tinny music, the PA system announced names of the missing.

title: Import Export the Animal Beside Us

title: Queen Mania: The Show Must Go On
Replay Revenge
description: Basil Khalil, an English-Irish-Israeli-Palestinian young filmmaker shows us a tongue-in-cheek, entertaining and refreshing approach to the Israeli Palestinian conflict.

title: Agustina Bessa-Luís: Nasci Adulta e Morrerei Criança
Sam Sherman Interviews Actor John Gabriel
Die Wanderarbeiter von Shanghai
description: A group of Chinese peasants leave their homes on their search for jobs and better living. The documentary follows them from their impoverished home village in An Hui province to the construction sites of booming Shanghai.

title: Speak
description: A film that challenges bad stereotypes in hip-hop. Thoughts on politics, love and growing up non-white are here in a hip-hop world.

title: Marhaba Cousine
description: The documentary compares the completely different lives of two women. This is a journey into their common childhood as well as the very personal but critical confrontation with the subject of women in Islam and women's roles in general.

title: Runaway Grooms
description: An investigative examination of cross-border extortion through India's dowry system.

title: Lemoyne
description: A look at the life and works of Quebec painter and performance artist, Serge Lemoyne (1941-1998). The mosaic is composed of 8mm and16mm film, personal videos of the artist that serve as a kind of diary, televisual archives, as well as interviews with the artist's peers, including Claude Péloquin, Marcel Saint-Pierre and Claude Jasmin. With his installations, performances and Land Art, Lemoyne shook the Quebec art scene beginning in 1963 with multidisciplinary events combining poetry, music, painting and dance. He also introduced Quebec to the spirit and practice of Pop Art. For Lemoyne, the boundary between art and life was blurred. For ten years he went through his "red, white and blue" period, the colours of the Montreal Canadiens hockey team and its stars Jean Béliveau, Guy Lafleur and Ken Dryden. From the early eighties until his death, he worked at transforming his native house of Acton Vale-destroyed by arson two years after his death-into a work of art, questioning in the process the nature of art and its role in society.

title: Jean Paul II - Portrait du Pape
School Mizugi Audition PART 5 Pure Pure Mizugi-hen
Stress 101
description: A middle school student talks to teachers and doctors about stress in the work and school place.

title: Cosmic Rock: When T.Rex Ruled the World
West of the Basque
description: Trace the Basque lines of history through the generations, from the early days as herders to the prominent spot the descendants of Basque immigrants hold in Idaho today.

title: Clora Venus
description: From a young pious Muslim, Shafique Mohammed Isaacs transformed into Leoness von Cleeffe, and bowed out as South Africa's greatest Drag Diva when she committed suicide on 20 August 2001. For the multitude that loved, greatly revered and marveled at her, this humble offering is a proud cinematic farewell to an entertainer that mesmerized and inspired thousands who experienced her. The documentary traces Leoness' rollercoaster ride from her beginnings in Cape Town to the last moments of her life in Johannesburg.

title: Der andere Liebestod - John Neumeier inszeniert 'Tod in Venedig'
Les chants de bataille - Jac Berrocal
